Text.Page:
I've received a report from Tashaberia. Apparently something suspicious is going on. I'm not sure; the report I got was very disjointed.

I've already sent an investigator named Elsta—catch up with him near the Free Brotherhood's encampment. He should have more information by now.

Oh, Cardis sent you, too?

All right, what I've figured out so far is that the {@linkcreature:19#4002#Lokian cleavers} and {@linkcreature:19#4004#Lokian swordlords} are powerful elite fighters. Also that I am not strong enough to fight them.

So...you should probably do it. You'll need to collect their weapons so we can send them to Velika for examination.

Excellent work! I'll send these to Velika right away—along with a note of your distinguished service, of course.

Please take this as a sign of our appreciation.
We need those weapons. If they contain any clues at all, they'll be valuable.
